event.description: Fred Lewis singles on a line drive to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Edgar Renteria grounds into a double play, second baseman Orlando Hudson to first baseman Mark Loretta. Fred Lewis out at 2nd.
Randy Winn lines out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Pablo Sandoval grounds out, pitcher Chad Billingsley to first baseman Mark Loretta.
Aaron Rowand pops out to second baseman Orlando Hudson.
Travis Ishikawa strikes out swinging.
Juan Uribe lines out to right fielder Andre Ethier.
Emmanuel Burriss singles on a ground ball to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Barry Zito out on a sacrifice bunt, pitcher Chad Billingsley to first baseman Mark Loretta. Emmanuel Burriss to 2nd.
Fred Lewis grounds out, shortstop Rafael Furcal to first baseman Mark Loretta.
Edgar Renteria walks.
Randy Winn grounds out to first baseman Mark Loretta. Edgar Renteria to 2nd.
Pablo Sandoval grounds out to first baseman Mark Loretta. Edgar Renteria to 3rd.

Juan Uribe strikes out swinging.
Emmanuel Burriss strikes out swinging.
Barry Zito strikes out swinging.
Fred Lewis singles on a line drive to center fielder Matt Kemp.
With Edgar Renteria batting, Fred Lewis caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Russell Martin to shortstop Rafael Furcal.

Pablo Sandoval flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp. Edgar Renteria to 3rd.
Aaron Rowand out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder Andre Ethier in foul territory. Edgar Renteria scores.
Travis Ishikawa strikes out on a foul tip.
Juan Uribe singles on a ground ball to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Emmanuel Burriss singles on a ground ball to shortstop Rafael Furcal. Juan Uribe to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Eugenio Velez replaces Barry Zito.
Eugenio Velez out on a sacrifice bunt, third baseman Casey Blake to second baseman Orlando Hudson. Juan Uribe to 3rd. Emmanuel Burriss to 2nd.
Chad Billingsley intentionally walks Fred Lewis.
Edgar Renteria out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Matt Kemp. Juan Uribe scores. Emmanuel Burriss to 3rd.
Randy Winn walks. Fred Lewis to 2nd.
Pablo Sandoval singles on a ground ball to shortstop Rafael Furcal. Emmanuel Burriss scores. Fred Lewis to 3rd. Randy Winn to 2nd.
Aaron Rowand lines out to left fielder Juan Pierre.
Pitching Change: Ronald Belisario replaces Chad Billingsley, batting 8th.
Travis Ishikawa strikes out swinging.
Juan Uribe singles on a ground ball to shortstop Rafael Furcal.
Emmanuel Burriss flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Eugenio Velez grounds into a force out, second baseman Orlando Hudson to shortstop Rafael Furcal. Juan Uribe out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Ramon Troncoso replaces Ronald Belisario, batting 6th, replacing Xavier Paul.
Defensive Substitution: James Loney replaces pitcher Ronald Belisario, batting 8th, playing first base.
Nate Schierholtz flies out to left fielder Juan Pierre.
Edgar Renteria singles on a line drive to right fielder Andre Ethier.
With Randy Winn batting, Edgar Renteria caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Russell Martin to shortstop Rafael Furcal.

Mark Loretta grounds into a double play, third baseman Juan Uribe to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Travis Ishikawa. Russell Martin out at 2nd.
Casey Blake flies out to center fielder Aaron Rowand.
Chad Billingsley strikes out on a foul tip.
Juan Pierre hit by pitch.
Rafael Furcal grounds out, pitcher Barry Zito to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Travis Ishikawa. Juan Pierre to 2nd.

Andre Ethier pops out to catcher Pablo Sandoval in foul territory.
Matt Kemp singles on a ground ball to shortstop Edgar Renteria.

Russell Martin singles on a ground ball to left fielder Fred Lewis. Matt Kemp to 3rd. Russell Martin out at 2nd, left fielder Fred Lewis to third baseman Juan Uribe to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss.
Mark Loretta strikes out swinging.
Casey Blake doubles (5) on a fly ball to center fielder Aaron Rowand, deflected by left fielder Fred Lewis. Matt Kemp scores.
Chad Billingsley grounds out, third baseman Juan Uribe to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Pitching Change: Jeremy Affeldt replaces Barry Zito, batting 1st, replacing left fielder Fred Lewis.
Eugenio Velez remains in the game as the left fielder.

Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Xavier Paul replaces Mark Loretta.
Casey Blake called out on strikes.

Juan Pierre grounds into a force out, shortstop Edgar Renteria to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss. James Loney out at 2nd. Juan Pierre to 1st.
Rafael Furcal grounds into a double play, shortstop Edgar Renteria to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Travis Ishikawa. Juan Pierre out at 2nd.
